metadata.title: Trustify
metadata.description: Trustify helps you find and share authentic reviews of businesses. We build trust through transparency.
metadata.ogDescription: Find and share authentic reviews of businesses with Trustify.
metadata.keywords: reviews, business reviews, trust, transparent, Trustify

introBusiness.trustedPlatform: Trusted platform by thousands of businesses
introBusiness.heroTitle: Smart review management for your business
introBusiness.heroSubtitle: Collect, analyze, and respond to customer reviews with advanced AI technology. Build trust and grow your business with Trustify.
introBusiness.featuresSubtitle: All the tools you need to manage reviews and grow your business
introBusiness.dashboardDesc: Track overview with average rating, total reviews, response rate and key metrics.
introBusiness.reviewsDesc: View, filter and respond to all customer reviews from one place.
introBusiness.aiAnalyticsDesc: AI analyzes sentiment, finds strengths/weaknesses and suggests improvements for your business.
introBusiness.invitationsDesc: Invite customers to leave reviews via automatic or manual emails.
introBusiness.campaignsDesc: Create and manage targeted review collection campaigns.
introBusiness.verificationDesc: Verify your business to get the Verified badge and increase credibility.
introBusiness.aiSectionDesc: Our AI system analyzes thousands of reviews to provide valuable insights for your business.
introBusiness.aiFeature1: Automatic sentiment analysis - positive, negative, neutral
introBusiness.aiFeature2: Identify strengths and areas for improvement
introBusiness.aiFeature3: Specific action suggestions based on customer feedback
introBusiness.pricingDesc: Choose a plan that fits your business size. From free to Premium with all features.
introBusiness.supportDesc: Our support team is always ready to help you anytime.
introBusiness.ctaDesc: Join thousands of businesses using Trustify to manage reviews and build customer trust.

registerBusiness.buildCredibilityDesc: Collect trustworthy reviews on an open, transparent platform millions of consumers use.
registerBusiness.strengthenReputationDesc: 94% of new users that automated review invites increased their TrustScore*
registerBusiness.growPerformanceDesc: Trustify stars and content are proven to convert at higher rates than those of competitors
registerBusiness.sentVerificationCode: We've sent a verification code to
registerBusiness.companyAccountCreated: Your company account has been created.
registerBusiness.goToDashboardQuestion: Would you like to go to your Company Dashboard now?

reviewModal.noIncentive: and you haven't received an incentive to write it.

aboutSection.title: We're Trustify
aboutSection.description: We're a review platform that's open to everyone. Our vision is to become the universal symbol of trust â€” by empowering people to shop with confidence, and helping companies improve.

trustReport.title: Our new Trust Report has landed!
trustReport.description: Find out which actions we've taken to protect you and promote trust on our platform.

about.heroSubtitle: A review platform that's open to everyone. Our vision is to become the universal symbol of trust.
about.missionDesc1: Trustify was founded with the mission to build trust between consumers and businesses. We believe everyone deserves access to honest information to make smart shopping decisions.
about.missionDesc2: We create a transparent platform where consumers can share real experiences and businesses can listen, learn, and improve their services.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.valueTrustDesc: Building trust through honest and authentic reviews
about.valueTransparencyDesc: All reviews are displayed publicly, without bias
about.valueIntegrityDesc: Protecting the integrity of the review system
about.valueOpennessDesc: Open platform for everyone, every business
about.whatWeDoSubtitle: Trustify provides tools to connect consumers and businesses
about.featureReviewsDesc: Help consumers share experiences and read reviews from others
about.featureAnalyticsDesc: Provide valuable insights for businesses from customer feedback
about.featureFeedbackDesc: Bridge for businesses to listen and respond to customers
about.featureVerificationDesc: Verify business identity to increase credibility
about.step1Desc: Find the company you want to review or learn about
about.step2Desc: See reviews from people who have experienced it
about.step3Desc: Write a review to help others make decisions
about.ctaDesc: Join the Trustify community and share your experience today

suspension.title: Account Suspended
suspension.message: Your account has been suspended for **7 days** due to excessive reports on your comments. Please return when the suspension period ends.
suspension.messagePermanent: Your account has been **permanently suspended** due to serious violations of community standards. You can no longer post reviews on Trustify.
suspension.reportBlocked: Your account is currently suspended. You cannot report reviews at this time.
